channel.title: PepsiScape v1 [525]
channel.description:
Well this is gonna be my first release when its done! Please if you don't have anything nice to say don't say anything at all. I'm not a pro coder but I think i'm pretty good, this is used with Erpkz cache. This is about 12% done.
Codes: Green - Done / Yellow - In process / Red - Not done
10% done Shop titles colored All skills working 50% New home Custom home never used before (that i'v never seen) Custom colored yells, crowns. Charms for summoning in shop Custom barrow, torva, pernix, etc. All shops hold amount of items buy-able for one person custom background Custom Mainframe Skills 100% working Summoning pouches 100% P ring deleted New armor colors Multi exp for mods+ Double loots for clans bigger then 5 people Loyalty shop with auras, titles, and weapons. Buy "x" amount button instead of 1-50
Well hope you like what i'm planning to do and take a look at the photos below for better view.

item.title: PepsiScape v1 [525]
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

I’v done a lot more, such as. “Altars, stalls, custom shops, agility rewards, colored barrows/pernix/torva” and more, plus i’m still working on it. that’s why I said only 12% done.

Read full topic

item.title: PepsiScape v1 [525]
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

Well this is gonna be my first release when its done! Please if you don’t have anything nice to say don’t say anything at all. I’m not a pro coder but I think i’m pretty good, this is used with Erpkz cache. This is about 12% done.

Codes: Green - Done / Yellow - In process / Red - Not done

10% done
Shop titles colored
All skills working 50%
New home
Custom home never used before (that i’v never seen)
Custom colored yells, crowns.
Charms for summoning in shop
Custom barrow, torva, pernix, etc.
All shops hold amount of items buy-able for one person
custom background
Custom Mainframe
Skills 100% working
Summoning pouches 100%
P ring deleted
New armor colors
Multi exp for mods+
Double loots for clans bigger then 5 people
Loyalty shop with auras, titles, and weapons.
Buy “x” amount button instead of 1-50

Well hope you like what i’m planning to do and take a look at the photos below for better view.
